alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 5:49AM CST until December 13 at 1:31PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN PARKER AND NORTHEASTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 548 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Palo Pinto, or 10 miles west of Mineral Wells, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Cool and Lake Mineral Wells around 610 AM CST. Mineral Wells around 615 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Adell, Peaster, Whitt, Advance, Authon, Garner, Salesville and Peadenville. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter now! Get to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building and avoid windows.
